issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. Issue Description 

Creating new project and selecting only iPad in TiAPP.xml and build the application for iPad with hyper loop on

It throws following error:
{code}
INFO] : Processing Titanium symbols
[INFO] : Removing files
[INFO] : Invoking xcodebuild
[ERROR] : ** BUILD FAILED **
[ERROR] : The following build commands failed:
[ERROR] : Ld build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/iDeal-Dev.app/iDeal-Dev normal x86_64
[ERROR] : (1 failure)
{code}
fields.summary: iOS: iPad-only app doesn't work using Hyperloop

comments.body: Marking as Duplicate of TIMOB-24878. Thanks to this ticket, it looks like it's related to the iPad specifically. We have a fix available already and will publish it with Hyperloop 2.1.3 (likely next week) and provide a local fix that can be applied today.
